Cookbook

Research

Have you ever wanted somewhere to store all of your recipies and have them accesible at any time. Virtual Cookbook is the website for you.

Virtual cookbook is a SAAS website design created for stay at home moms, bakers and chef. It is a platform that offers many features. This website allows users to take a tour of the available features as well as view pricing options before purchasing.
